entry.title: Petra - Rolled Fondant White - 10 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Petra
Type: BAKING
Price: 67.99

Petra - Rolled Fondant White - 10 Kg

  • Easy Ice rolled fondant produces a smooth, elegant finish to any cake, cookie, dessert or confectionery. Our unique formula and mixing process produces a creamy, smooth product that is freezer and fridge stable and ready for your baking creation.
  • Spend more time decorating and less time fussing. Every batch of our ready to roll fondant ensures a high quality, even texture for consistent workability every time. Our pre-made fondant saves you time and effort.
  • Rolls ultra thin, isn't sticky, won't fade or dry out too quickly and holds it's shape to create custom decorations like bows, flowers, cake toppers or where ever your imagination takes you.
  • Never tried using fondant? Open up a whole new world of professional looking cake decorating possibilities. Find out how easily you can become a cake artist with our colourful range of EasyIce rolled fondant.
  • Made in Canada
